original_title: Ang Lahat ng Ito'y Para Sa'yo
overview: Ariel escaped being run over by a chauffeur-driven car with Cathy and her sister. The movie moved on with the main characters meeting for the second time in the restaurant where Ariel worked as a waiter. She was so smitten she did everything to win him over.
title: Ang Lahat ng Ito'y Para Sa'yo
